meanings.definition: A tool used for shaping wood by shaving off thin layers.
meanings.sent1: The drawshave is perfect for smoothing out rough edges on the wooden table.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used the drawshave to carefully sculpt the chair legs.
meanings.sent3: I tried to use the drawshave as a potato peeler, but it didn't work at all!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a drawshave, cutting through the layers of his defenses.
meanings.sent5: The drawshave glided effortlessly through the wood, leaving a smooth finish behind.

meanings.definition: To use a drawshave tool to shape wood.
meanings.sent1: He will drawshave the wooden beam to create a curved design for the project.
meanings.sent2: She drawshaves with precision, ensuring each piece fits perfectly together.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to drawshave the acorn into a tiny sculpture but gave up quickly.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to drawshave the memories, smoothing out the rough edges of the past.
meanings.sent5: With each stroke, he drawshaved the wood, revealing the beauty hidden within.
